#summary Acceptance criteria scenarios on User Story 13

*User Story*

As a contestant<br/>
I want to log in to the system<br/>
so that I am authenticated and I have privileges to upload sources<br/>

*Scenario 1*

  # Go to the main page<br/>
  # Fill incorrect user or password<br/>
  # Logging must be unseccessfull - information about that must be given<br/>

*Scenario 2*

  # Go to the main page<br/>
  # Fill correct user or password<br/>
  # Logging must be seccessfull and "Source Upload" page must be shown<br/>
